PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-11142010-09-23,  ,  ,  ,  HERITAGE,  PSC
ActPublic Service Employment Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Office of the Governor General’s Secretary Employment Regulations, 2010
PrecisRegulations Amending the OFFICE OF THE GOVERNOR GENERAL'S SECRETARY EMPLOYMENT REGULATIONS, 2010 in order to maintain parity between the rights and entitlements of persons employed in an excluded position in the Office of the Governor General’s Secretary and those of Ministers’ Staff, who perform similar functions and duties.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0198 Publication Date: 2010-10-13
AttachmentsAttachment
